summary: The Building U.S. Infrastructure by Leveraging Demands for Skills (BUILDS) Act authorizes the Secretary of Labor to award grants to partnerships within targeted infrastructure industries (energy, construction, IT, utilities, transportation) to improve worker training, retention, and advancement. Grants will fund activities like industry collaboration, training needs assessments, curriculum alignment, and support services for workers in work-based learning programs. The goal is to encourage industry growth and competitiveness. Funds are designated over a five-year period beginning in fiscal year 2026.
